channel.title: 第四部分 附录 on Go 学习笔记
channel.description: Recent content in 第四部分 附录 on Go 学习笔记

item.title: 4.1 教程
item.description: Go 教程 # 基础 # Go 学习笔记，第六版 - 雨痕 # 50 Shades of Go: Traps, Gotchas, and Common Mistakes for New Golang Devs # Go 新手可能会踩的 50 个坑 Go by Example # mmcgrana/gobyexample 中文翻译： gobyexample-cn/gobyexample https://gobyexample-cn.github.io/ build web application with golang # astaxie/build-web-application-with-golang A golang ebook intro how to build a web with golang Go 语言高性能编程 # geektutu/high-performance-go 7days-golang # geektutu/7days-golang 7 天用 Go 从零实现系列 Go 语言 101 # go101/go101 An online book focusing on Go syntax/semantics and runtime related things

item.title: 4.2 面试题
item.description: Go 语言面试题 # 基础题 # Using reference to loop iterator variable Using goroutines on loop iterator variables 参考：go 易错点 进阶题 # 综合 # shomali11/go-interview lifei6671/interview-go 你遇到过哪些高质量的 Go 语言面试题？

item.title: 4.3 关注项目
item.description: 关注项目 # 主流 # golang/go # kubernetes/kubernetes # moby/moby # etcd-io/etcd # Distributed reliable key-value store for the most critical data of a distributed system Web 框架 # gin-gonic/gin # Gin is a HTTP web framework written in Go (Golang). It features a Martini-like API with much better performance – up to 40 times faster. If you need smashing performance, get yourself some Gin. https://gin-gonic.com/ beego/beego # beego is an open-source, high-performance web framework for the Go programming language.

item.title: 4.4 一些八卦
item.description: 一些八卦 # golang.org/pkg/ vs pkg.go.dev # golang.org/pkg/ 等于 pkg.go.dev/std pkg.go.dev/std 有各种版本 godoc.org # godoc.org 会跳转到 pkg.go.dev/?utm_source=godoc 再跳转到 pkg.go.dev
